Translations.EndUser_Header: ## You were flagged as a bot.
Translations.EndUser_Description:
You received a month timeout in **{0}** for bot-spamming.
Please see the flagged message contents below. If you have regained access to your account, you will be able to revoke your timeout early by interacting with the button below.
Translations.EndUser_Button_Secured: You marked your account as secured
Translations.Mod_Description:
Their access to the server was revoked for a month.
{0}
Translations.Mod_DM_Sent: A **Direct Message was sent** to the user allowing them to revoke their timeout by clicking a button stating they have 'regained access to their account'.
Translations.Mod_DM_NotSent: A **Direct Message was not sent** to the user as they were closed. They will not be able to revoke their timeout themselves.
Translations.Mod_Announce_Revoked: {0} has marked their account as **secure** and their timeout was revoked for bot-spamming.
Translations.EndUser_RevokedConfirmation: Your timeout has been revoked in **{0}**.
